reviews.review: Игра на уровне бог, в ней всё есть , онлайн с друзьями , онлайн с рандомами , и люди не забрасывают эту игру , много оружия , и много карт , и миссий + мастерская стим очень богатая
Ótimo jogo de zumbi, um clássico, recomendo demais!
Buen juego para pasar el rato con amigos, lo unico malo es que casi no hay servers en español...!
Хорошая игра за свои деньги,не зря купил,советую брать!
Мясоооооооооо...... и страшна в темноте. УУУУУУУУУУУУУУУ
It's ok but is more fun if you have friends to play
Хорошая игра для фана с друзьями!
Нестареющая классика для меня! Всегда рад зайти и поиграть с друзбями.

Эххх,ностальгия,помню как с пацанами играли в неё в комп.клубе днями на пролёт,аж слизинку пустил
Настоятельно рекомендую
This game was and is still good. I mean really good
All ways a good game with friends.

Pros for this game:
Not lagging to much 
Killing zombies is easy
Weapons are good but the weapons skins are nothing it's just to make it look good for me it doesn't have to be good 
First playing this game earned lots of achievements
 there is only one boss
Cons for it:
Can't run like really it's hard to get to the trader and also run away from the zombies to kill them you could had add that
Can't shove them despite they grab and you dead
Not much weapons to use some of the weapons are in Dlc so it's little of cash grab 
Since there is little bit of bad Game play i rate it 10/10 just because it's bad ass game i ever played and also the second one as well
10/10, game is a classic. Keep coming back to this one.
game bom apesar de hoje em dia muito esquecido!!
실험체 사지분리 되는거 보고 오르가즘 느끼는 게임
Best zomb- Zed shooter ive ever played
Re purchased this game because i missed it
Muito divertido pra jogar com a galera!!!!!
Es increíble pero no se me da.
Priti gud gheim sa moara baetii mei!

O Estilo de jogo lembra o modo zumbi do Black ops, sendo que Killing Floor é mais leve e tem diferentes classes e vários tipos de zumbi, podendo jogar de 4-6 jogadores com seus amigos ou com pessoas aleatorias, sendo mais divertido com seus amigos, ele possui um modo solo também, e tem como baixar Mapas para jogar com seus amigos, tendo vários mapas bem divertidos. Esse jogo recomendo pra quem não tem um PC Bom como o meu, e ainda agora que está bem barato na promoção, acho que vale muito a pena
Muy buen juego fue mi infancia
U této hry jsem kdysi začínal Kooperační RPG. Hra je chytlavá a pro týmové hraní v kooperaci je vynikající. Když vyšlo KF 2, byla to jasná volba :-)
This game is better then kf2, TOTTALY!!!
Игра очень классная, очень большой разновидность пушек, так же и видов монстров не мало и карт довольно много, хорошо что в игре сделали multiplayer, с друзьями будет интереснее играть. Рекомендую!
Not a bad game to be sure.

Игра очень интересная в плане хоррор шутера. Есть маленькая проблема где игроки еще не нашли способ исправления 1 мелкой ошибки ( Build UT2004_Build_[2004-11-11_10.48]

OS: Windows NT 6.2 (Build: 9200)
CPU: GenuineIntel PentiumPro-class processor @ 1804 MHz with 3981MB RAM
Video: NVIDIA GeForce GT 740M (8857)

Error setting display mode: No acceptable display modes found (D3D_OK). Please delete your KillingFloor.ini file if this error prevents you from starting the game.

Журнал: UD3D9RenderDevice::UnSetRes <- FindBestMatchingMode <- UD3D9RenderDevice::SetRes <- UWindowsViewport::TryRenderDevice <- UWindowsViewport::OpenWindow <- UGameEngine::Init <- InitEngine <- FMallocWindows::Free) 
Если вы хотите поиграть в эту игру то советаю купить установить и проверить есть у вас такая ошибка или нет. Игра норм но я поставлю 3/5
I like this!But now it's boring.
for an old game it's fascinating that the community is still alive...

This game is absolutely amazing. And reminds me of the survival horror game trailers from the early 2000's. It ages very well. Pyrocynical and vanoss also play this game so its really good. The mechanics take a bit to get use to but then its very very fun

UN EXCELENTE JUEGO COOPERATIVO.
Pros: Atmósfera, música y dificultad.
Contras: Animaciones, contenido.. mucho contenido afuera que debería ser parte del juego.

Killing Floor tiene un ambiente tétrico y la BSO compuesta por un espeso heavy metal que le queda de maravilla. Todos estos aspectos, que a pesar de estar limitado en cuanto a despliegue técnico, lo compensa en mucha personalidad (gameplay, interfaz, personajes, etc).
Recomiendo comprarlo SOLO si esta en OFERTA, el online no es lo que fue pero sigue respirando. Y un detalle que me molesto es el absurdo de los precios por el DLC. Por mi, no vale la pena; solo si de verdad te gusta y te sobra un par de pavos, esperad a buenas ofertas.
A clasic one that is even better playing with friends
Killing weird mutating creatures has never been more satisfying! 10/10

After many years still playing it.
Also still better than Killing Floor 2 !!!

Графон - г❤❤но.
Разрабы - п❤❤орасы.
Аудитория - сплошь и рядом быдло, петухи и мамко❤бы.

В общем, всё как я люблю 10 из 10.
Conheci pessoas maravilhosas graças à esse jogo. 11/10
my go to game for stress relief, the best zombie horde mode game 10/10 would recommend.
This game should be on every shooter fan's list. Simple as that. 10/10 Still holds up to this day as hours of fun.

Great Game. Kill Zeds. Get Dosh.

Удивительно классный продукт, выросший из обычного мода.
Рекомендую всем.

Still has people playing and a pretty unique experience over Killing Floor 2. Movement is more restrictive making it pretty tense and at this point it is full of extra content like weapons and maps that were released for free over the years and it goes for sale cheap. Same format as Killing Floor 2, small map with a wave of enemies with a brief pause inbetween waves to stock up and you are tasked to survive until the last wave where a boss appears. Choose your class(perks) and advance them by performing their role, like using fire as a firebug or explosives as demo. Was legendary back in the day and still well worth it now.
Amazing multiplayer/coop game. Easy bang for your buck!
不错的一款游戏，一开始玩的时候还是感觉挺吓人的。
